actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act.

summary.text: Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to increase the responsibility of the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the National Park Service, as regards the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts to include structural and other building repairs, maintenance, security, and utilities. Limits the Secretary's responsibility for utilities to 70 percent of the total cost of such utilities at the Center. Limits the responsibilities of the Secretary as regards maintenance and janitorial services at the Center. Authorizes the Secretary to furnish, on a reimbursable basis, either directly or by contract, services which are the responsibility of the Board of Trustees of the Center. Adds the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of the Treasury to the Board. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to forgive the Board from payment of interest due and accruing on parking revenue bonds under specified circumstances. Authorizes the Center to issue additional revenue bonds to the Secretary.

titles.title: A bill to amend the John F. Kennedy Center Act.
